    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:S193_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>S193_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Life in the Palaeozoic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leben im Palaeozoic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie dans le Palaeozoic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vida no Palaeozoic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vita nel Palaeozoic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωή στο Palaeozoic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vida en el Palaeozoic</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Fossils are a glimpse into the distant past and fascinate young and old alike. This unit will introduce you to the explosion of evolution that took place during the Palaeozoic era. You will look at the many different types of creatures that existed at that time and how they managed to evolve to exist on land.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Animal_phyla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Burgess_Shale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Era</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Evolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Extinction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Fauna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Fossil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Invertebrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Palaeozoic_life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Period</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Phyla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Taxonomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Trilobite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Vertebrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Vertebrate_evolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fossilien sind ein Blick in das entfernte letzte 
und faszinieren junges und altes gleich. Diese Maßeinheit 
stellt Sie zur Explosion der Entwicklung vor, die während der 
Palaeozoic Ära stattfand. Sie betrachten die vielen 
unterschiedlichen Typen der Geschöpfe, die zu dieser Zeit existierten
und wie sie handhatten zu entwickeln, um vom Land zu existieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les fossiles sont un aperçu dans le passé 
éloigné et fascinent jeune et vieux semblable. Cette unité 
vous présentera à l'explosion de l'évolution qui a eu lieu pendant 
l'ère de Palaeozoic. Vous regarderez les nombreux différents 
types des créatures qui ont existé à ce moment-là et de la façon 
dont ils sont parvenus à évoluer pour exister sur la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os fossils são um glimpse no passado distante e 
fascinam semelhante novo e velho. Esta unidade introduzi-lo-á 
à explosão da evolução que ocorreu durante a era de Palaeozoic. 
Você olhará muitos tipos diferentes de criaturas que existiram
nesse tempo e de como controlaram evoluir para existir na terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I fossili sono un glimpse nel passato distante ed
affascinano simile giovane e vecchio. Questa unità li 
introdurrà all'esplosione di sviluppo che ha avvenuto durante l'era 
di Palaeozoic. Guarderete i molti tipi differenti di creature 
che hanno esistito a quel tempo e di come sono riuscito a evolversi 
per esistere su terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα απολιθώματα είναι μια αναλαμπή απόμακρο στον 
προηγούμενο και συναρπάζουν νέο και παλαιό όμοιο. Αυτή η 
μονάδα θα σας εισαγάγει στην έκρηξη της εξέλιξης που 
πραγματοποιήθηκε κατά τη διάρκεια της εποχής Palaeozoic. 
Θα εξετάσετε τους πολλούς διαφορετικούς τύπους πλασμάτων 
που υπήρξαν εκείνη την περίοδο και πώς κατόρθωσαν να εξελιχθούν 
για να υπάρξουν στο έδαφος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los fósiles son una ojeada en el último 
distante y fascinan semejante joven y viejo. Esta unidad le 
introducirá a la explosión de la evolución que ocurrió durante la 
era de Palaeozoic. Usted mirará los muchos diversos tipos de 
criaturas que existieron en aquella 'epoca y de cómo manejaron 
desarrollarse para existir en pista.</string>
          </description>
